CustomField.description: Generates URL for Fleet Central Documents
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Fleet_Central_Contract_Number__c),
IF( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Create_Project__c = TRUE, HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/BD%20Documents/" & Contract_Number__c, "Fleet Central Documents", "_blank"), HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/Pages/Projects.aspx", "Fleet Central Documents", "_blank")),
IF( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Create_Project__c = TRUE, HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/BD%20Documents/" &SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Fleet_Central_Contract_Number__c, "Fleet Central Documents", "_blank"), HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/Pages/Projects.aspx", "Fleet Central Documents", "_blank"))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to Fleet Central Document Library for this Quote
CustomField.label: Fleet Central Documents
